title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 August 2014 - XWiki
content:
<Denis1> has quit

00:28 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki

01:51 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
01:51 <momomomomo> hello - is anyone around?  
01:52 <momomomomo> I’ve been trying to get an apt-get install of xwiki to work for ~1.5 hours now  
01:52 <momomomomo> I have no idea what’s going wrong :/  
02:00 <momomomomo> ah got it  
02:00 <momomomomo> hidden was an openjdk install of java 6; I’d tried to uninstall it before but failed ~\_~

14:35 <woshilapin> Hi devs, I'm trying to use component manager but some of the methods seems deprecated  
14:35 <woshilapin> I used this  
14:36 <woshilapin> component = Utils.getComponentManager().getInstance(MyComponent.class);  
14:36 <woshilapin> And also found something like this  
14:36 <woshilapin> component = Utils.getComponent(MyComponent.class);  
14:36 <woshilapin> on this link http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/WritingComponents  
14:36 <woshilapin> But each of them seems deprecated  
14:37 <woshilapin> (don't even know if the second is correct)  
14:37 <woshilapin> Any idea?  
14:40 <woshilapin> precision: I'm not in a component class (so it seems that I cannot use @Inject)
